question: National Institute of Science Communication and Policy Research has been created under which organization?
explanation:
A new institution under the CSIR named – National Institute of Science Communication and Policy Research (CSIR – NISCPR) has been formed by merging CSIR-NISCAIR (National Institute of science, communication and information resources) and CSIR-NISTADS (National Institute of science, technology and development studies).
The foundation stone for the new organization was laid by the Union Minister for Science and Technology Harsh Vardhan.
